00008 /* Define periods/second */
00009 #define PPS 128
00010 
00011 /* Scaling factor for distance */
00012 #define DIST_SCALE (2 * PPS * PPS)
00013 
00014 /* Scaling factor for velocity */
00015 #define VEL_SCALE PPS
